channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Financing Social Protection through General Tax Revenues, Social Security Contributions and Formalisation in Thailand
item.description: Financing Social Protection through General Tax Revenues, Social Security Contributions and Formalisation in Thailand by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday 24 July 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Reinforcing Chilean policies for the inclusion of students with an immigrant background
item.description: Reinforcing Chilean policies for the inclusion of students with an immigrant background by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Friday 25 July 2025 at 10:00.

item.title: Regional Plastics Outlook for Southeast and East Asia
item.description: Regional Plastics Outlook for Southeast and East Asia by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 30 July 2025 at 9:00.

item.title: Ring-Fencing Mining Income - A toolkit for tax administrators and policy-makers
item.description: Ring-Fencing Mining Income - A toolkit for tax administrators and policy-makers by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Wednesday 30 July 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Regional Integration in the Union for the Mediterranean 2025 - Progress Report
item.description: Regional Integration in the Union for the Mediterranean 2025 - Progress Report by Global Relations and Cooperation Directorate has an embargo on Friday 12 September 2025 at 10:00.

item.title: The Green Transition of SMEs and Entrepreneurship in Portugal
item.description: The Green Transition of SMEs and Entrepreneurship in Portugal by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities has an embargo on Tuesday 23 September 2025 at 10:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities

item.title: Measuring Science and Innovation for Sustainable Growth
item.description: Measuring Science and Innovation for Sustainable Growth by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Thursday 9 October 2025 at 12:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry
